item.title: Unveiling yet another iteration of my hugo blog
item.description: Do not mind this content here. I am trying out some katex equations (print "hello, world") $$ k(\varphi) = \varphi - 1 $$ $$ n(\varphi) = z - \varphi $$ $$ n(\varphi, z) = z - \varphi $$ $$ F(z) = Fib(z) = \sum_{\varphi=1}^{z_{end}\ =\ round(\frac{z}{2})} {_{n(\varphi, z)\ =\ z - \varphi}}C _{k(\varphi)\ =\ \varphi - 1} $$ $$ F(z) = \sum_{\varphi=1}^{round(\frac{z}{2})}{_{z - \varphi}}C _{\varphi - 1} $$
